mapper.select: SELECT count(t.id) FROM t_user_traditional_pos_info t LEFT JOIN t_user_info t1 ON t.user_id = t1.id where t.user_id=#{map.user_id} AND t1.manager_id=#{map.manager_id} AND FIND_IN_SET(t.sn, #{map.sn_list}) AND t.del='0' AND T.state_status='1'
select * from t_user_traditional_pos_info where sn=#{sn} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_traditional_pos_info ( sn, user_id, card_settle_price, cloud_settle_price, weixin_settle_price, zhifubao_settle_price, single_profit_rate, cash_back_rate, mer_cap_fee, state_status, del, remark, create_by, cre_date, cre_time,card_settle_price_vip) values ( #{sn}, #{user_id}, #{card_settle_price}, #{cloud_settle_price}, #{weixin_settle_price}, #{zhifubao_settle_price}, #{single_profit_rate}, #{cash_back_rate},#{mer_cap_fee}, #{state_status}, #{del}, #{remark}, #{create_by}, #{cre_date}, #{cre_time}, #{card_settle_price_vip})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_traditional_pos_info SET del=#{map.new_del},up_date=#{map.up_date}, up_time=#{map.up_time},update_by=#{map.update_by},remark = #{map.remark} WHERE sn=#{map.sn} AND del=#{map.old_del} AND user_id IN ( SELECT id FROM t_user_info WHERE ( FIND_IN_SET(#{map.user_id}, parent_chain) OR FIND_IN_SET(id, #{map.parent_chain}) ) )
mapper.select: select id,real_name from t_user_info where referer_id=#{user_id} and algebra=2 and auth_status='09'
